teaching_function: Spark of Divine Consciousness - Your healing journey begins
daemon_guardian: Ignitus the Awakener - Guardian of Sacred Beginnings
notes: The first breath of your healing journey. Honor where you are now.

teaching_function: Infinite Cycles of Healing - What ends, begins anew
daemon_guardian: Cyclus the Eternal - Guardian of Sacred Patterns
notes: Healing is not linear. Trust the spiral path of transformation.

teaching_function: Sacred Heart Opening - Love as the ultimate healer
daemon_guardian: Cordialis the Heart-Keeper - Guardian of Divine Love
notes: The heart knows what the mind has forgotten. Trust its wisdom.

teaching_function: Master Builder Energy - Creating solid foundations for healing
daemon_guardian: Structura the Foundation-Layer - Guardian of Sacred Order
notes: Before reaching for the stars, ensure your roots are deep and strong.

teaching_function: Sacred Union - Balancing opposites within yourself
daemon_guardian: Lunaria the Balance-Keeper - Guardian of Sacred Duality
notes: You contain multitudes. Honor both your light and shadow as sacred.

teaching_function: Completion and Integration - Wisdom earned through experience
daemon_guardian: Completius the Integration-Master - Guardian of Sacred Wholeness
notes: You have walked through fire and emerged transformed. Honor your journey.

teaching_function: Divine Completion - Seeing with the eyes of compassion
daemon_guardian: Visionar the Sight-Giver - Guardian of Sacred Vision
notes: You now see with the eyes of divine compassion. Share this vision.

teaching_function: Spiritual Mastery - Transcending limitations through love
daemon_guardian: Transcendor the Limit-Breaker - Guardian of Sacred Freedom
notes: You have transcended your original limitations. Now help others do the same.

teaching_function: Sacred Communication - Speaking truth with compassion
daemon_guardian: Comunicar the Truth-Speaker - Guardian of Sacred Voice
notes: Your voice now carries healing frequency. Speak your truth with love.

teaching_function: Divine Embodiment - Living as a healing presence on Earth
daemon_guardian: Infinitus the Eternal Light - Guardian of Sacred Service
notes: You are now a living blessing. Your very presence heals. Go forth and shine.
